ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates the startup performance of SciChart by loading 1,000,000 points from cold in under 100ms
ExampleDefinition.Description:
This demo showcases the loading or startup time of SciChart by appending one million points to the chart and rendering in under 100ms!
[b][i]Example Usage[/i][/b] Click 'Create Data' to create 1 million points instantly!
Then Zoom and Pan the chart to see the smoothness.
